Address.label: Address
Address.value: 302 EAST PETTIGREW STREET,DIBRELL BUILDING, SUITE A-100, DURHAM, North Carolina, 27701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Precision BioSciences Inc is a genome editing company dedicated to improving life through its genome editing platform, ARCUS. It leverages ARCUS in the development of its product candidates, which are designed to treat human diseases and provide food and agricultural solutions. The company's segments include Therapeutics and Food out of which the Therapeutics segment act as a key revenue driver for the firm.
